and in the number of stars 
imprinted on the film.
These differences are tracable 
to at least three causes.
<u>First<\u>, to duration of exposure 
<u>second <\u>, to varying sensitiveness 
of the film.
<u>Third <\u>, to hygrometric states 
of the atmosphere.
In this communication 
I propose only to deal 
with the differences caused 
by various exposures, and 
to illustrate these by a 
photographic plate which 
is an enlargement to <s>three 
and a half <\s> five diameters of 
two <s>others <\s> separate plates: the One of <u>Polaris<\u>
taken on the 6th May this year,
